titleInfo.title: 59th Annual Convention of the International Order of B'nai B'rith

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 14 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Printed on the front of the photograph: ''59th Annual Convention D.G.L. No2. I.O.B.B. Denver, June, 1911'' and '''Mile High' Photo Co. Denver.'' On the back of the photograph ''B'nai B'rith, Denver Lodge #171, 560 So. Monaco, Denver, CO, 80224'' is stamped twice. Handwritten on the back: ''#818 oversize, B'nai B'rith Convention, 1911.''

mods.abstract: Delegates to the 59th Annual Convention of the Internation Order of B'nai B'rith are posed in front of the Guggenheim Pavilion at National Jewish Hospital. The men in suits and the women in dresses and hats are standing and sitting in five rows. Other buildings can be seen in the background. Six men are watching behind a brick wall to the left of the building.The convention was held in Denver in June 1911.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 73.
Donated by Ann Epstein, B'nai B'rith Denver Lodge #171, October 1987.

name.namePart: Independent Order of B'nai B'rith Lodge 171 (Denver, Colorado)
